chaupais.text: सखा धर्ममय अस रथ जाकें। जीतन कहँ न कतहुँ रिपु ताकें॥
chaupais.meaning: O friend, the one whose chariot is made entirely of dharma has no enemy that can defeat them.

chaupais.text: अब कछु नाथ न चाहिये मोरे, दीन दयाल अनुग्रह तोरे॥
chaupais.meaning: O Lord, I desire nothing now. Your grace alone is enough for this poor soul.

chaupais.text: बन्दउँ नाम राम रघुवर को। हेत प्रीति सुर सरेस रघुकुल को॥
chaupais.meaning: I bow to the name of Ram, the beloved of all divine beings and the pride of the Raghu lineage.

chaupais.text: प्रभु के चरन सरोज रज, निज मस्तक मनि हार। धरें राम को नाम जपें, मेटें संकट भार॥
chaupais.meaning: Those who adorn their head with the dust of Ram's lotus feet and chant his name, are freed from all sufferings.

chaupais.text: त्यागहि संपति सहज सुहाई। जो न लुब्ध ताहि सब भाई॥
chaupais.meaning: Renunciation is the greatest wealth. One who is not greedy is dear to all.

chaupais.text: जहाँ दया तहाँ धर्मु बस होई। पापु तहाँ नासही सबु कोई॥
chaupais.meaning: Where there is compassion, dharma resides. All sins are destroyed there.
